source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View horizon_appeals_document_metadata_new is created

%%sql
-- Build appeals_document_metadata_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW appeals_document_metadata_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.CaseReference IS NULL
        THEN T3.AppealsDocumentMetadataID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS AppealsDocumentMetadataID,
    T1.documentid	AS	documentId	,
    T1.casenodeid	AS	caseId	,
    T1.casereference	AS	caseReference	,
    T1.casenumber	AS	casenumber	,
    T1.caseworktype	AS	caseType	,
    T1.caseworktypegroup	AS	caseworktypegroup	,
    T1.caseworktypeabbreviation	AS	caseworktypeabbreviation	,
    T1.version	AS	version	,
    T1.viruscheckstatus	AS	virusCheckStatus	,
    T1.redactedStatus	AS	redactedStatus	,
    T1.filename	AS	filename	,
    T1.versionfilename	AS	versionfilename	,
    T1.documenttype	AS	documentType	,
    T1.documentdescription	AS	description	,
    T1.size	AS	size	,
    T1.incomingoutgoingexternal	AS	incomingoutgoingexternal	,
    T1.datecreated	AS	dateCreated	,
    T1.lastmodified	AS	lastModified	,
    T1.datepublished	AS	datePublished	,
    T1.publishedstatus	AS	publishedstatus	,
    T1.sourcesystem	AS	sourceSystem	,
    T1.folderid	AS	horizonFolderId	,
	T1.filename	AS	originalFilename	,
	AIE.mime	AS	mime	,
	AIE.documentURI	AS	documentURI	,
	null	AS	publishedDocumentURI	,
	AIE.fileMD5	AS	fileMD5	,
	null	AS	dateReceived	,
	null	AS	origin	,
	AIE.owner	AS	owner	,
	null	AS	author	,
	null	AS	caseStage	,
    
    "0" AS Migrated,
    "Horizon" AS ODTSourceSystem,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.documentid	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casenodeid	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casereference	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casenumber	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.caseworktype	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.caseworktypegroup	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.caseworktypeabbreviation	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.version	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.viruscheckstatus	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.redactedStatus	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.filename	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.versionfilename	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.documenttype	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.documentdescription	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.size	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.incomingoutgoingexternal	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.datecreated	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lastmodified	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.datepublished	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.publishedstatus	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.sourcesystem	,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.folderid	,'.'),
            IFNULL(AIE.mime	,'.'),
            IFNULL(AIE.documentURI	,'.'),
            IFNULL(AIE.fileMD5	,'.'),
            IFNULL(AIE.owner	,'.')

        ))                          AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields, so needs to be done
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_document_metadata T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.appeals_document_metadata T3 ON T1.CaseReference = T3.CaseReference AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.aie_document_data AIE on T1.documentId = AIE.documentId AND AIE.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.CaseReference = T3.CaseReference AND 
            md5(concat(
                IFNULL(T1.documentid	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casenodeid	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casereference	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casenumber	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.caseworktype	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.caseworktypegroup	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.caseworktypeabbreviation	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.version	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.viruscheckstatus	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.redactedStatus	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.filename	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.versionfilename	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.documenttype	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.documentdescription	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.size	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.incomingoutgoingexternal	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.datecreated	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.lastmodified	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.datepublished	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.publishedstatus	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.sourcesystem	,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.folderid	,'.'),
                IFNULL(AIE.mime	,'.'),
                IFNULL(AIE.documentURI	,'.'),
                IFNULL(AIE.fileMD5	,'.'),
                IFNULL(AIE.owner	,'.')
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same key, changed data
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.CaseReference IS NULL -- new 
            THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) 
    AND T1.CaseReference IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_document_metadata)

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View appeals_document_metadata_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW appeals_document_metadata_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
Select 
    AppealsDocumentMetadataID	,
    documentId	,
    caseId	,
    caseReference	,
    casenumber	,
    caseType	,
    caseworktypegroup	,
    caseworktypeabbreviation	,
    version	,
    virusCheckStatus	,
    redactedStatus	,
    filename	,
    versionfilename	,
    documentType	,
    description	,
    size	,
    incomingoutgoingexternal	,
    dateCreated	,
    lastModified	,
    datePublished	,
    publishedstatus	,
    sourceSystem	,
    horizonFolderId	,
    originalFilename	,
    mime	,
    documentURI	,
    publishedDocumentURI	,
    fileMD5	,
    dateReceived	,
    origin	,
    owner	,
    author	,
    caseStage	,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From appeals_document_metadata_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    AppealsDocumentMetadataID	,
    documentId	,
    caseId	,
    caseReference	,
    casenumber	,
    caseType	,
    caseworktypegroup	,
    caseworktypeabbreviation	,
    version	,
    virusCheckStatus	,
    redactedStatus	,
    filename	,
    versionfilename	,
    documentType	,
    description	,
    size	,
    incomingoutgoingexternal	,
    dateCreated	,
    lastModified	,
    datePublished	,
    publishedstatus	,
    sourceSystem	,
    horizonFolderId	,
    originalFilename	,
    mime	,
    documentURI	,
    publishedDocumentURI	,
    fileMD5	,
    dateReceived	,
    origin	,
    owner	,
    author	,
    caseStage	,
    Migrated,
    ODTSourceSystem,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.appeals_document_metadata
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM appeals_document_metadata_new WHERE documentId IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM appeals_document_metadata_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW appeals_document_metadata_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    AppealsDocumentMetadataID	,
    documentId	,
    caseId	,
    caseReference	,
    casenumber	,
    caseType	,
    caseworktypegroup	,
    caseworktypeabbreviation	,
    version	,
    virusCheckStatus	,
    redactedStatus	,
    filename	,
    versionfilename	,
    documentType	,
    description	,
    size	,
    incomingoutgoingexternal	,
    dateCreated	,
    lastModified	,
    datePublished	,
    publishedstatus	,
    sourceSystem	,
    horizonFolderId	,
    originalFilename	,
    mime	,
    documentURI	,
    publishedDocumentURI	,
    fileMD5	,
    dateReceived	,
    origin	,
    owner	,
    author	,
    caseStage	,
    T1.Migrated,
    T1.ODTSourceSystem,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM appeals_document_metadata_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View horizon_appeals_document_metadata_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.appeals_document_metadata is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.appeals_document_metadata AS Target
USING appeals_document_metadata_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.documentId = Target.documentId
AND Source.version = Target.version
AND Source.caseReference = Target.caseReference

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'
        
-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        AppealsDocumentMetadataID	,
        documentId	,
        caseId	,
        caseReference	,
        casenumber	,
        caseType	,
        caseworktypegroup	,
        caseworktypeabbreviation	,
        version	,
        virusCheckStatus	,
        redactedStatus	,
        filename	,
        versionfilename	,
        documentType	,
        description	,
        size	,
        incomingoutgoingexternal	,
        dateCreated	,
        lastModified	,
        datePublished	,
        publishedstatus	,
        sourceSystem	,
        horizonFolderId	,
        originalFilename	,
        mime	,
        documentURI	,
        publishedDocumentURI	,
        fileMD5	,
        dateReceived	,
        origin	,
        owner	,
        author	,
        caseStage	,
        Migrated,
        ODTSourceSystem,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive
    )
    VALUES (
        Source.AppealsDocumentMetadataID	,
        Source.documentId	,
        Source.caseId	,
        Source.caseReference	,
        Source.casenumber	,
        Source.caseType	,
        Source.caseworktypegroup	,
        Source.caseworktypeabbreviation	,
        Source.version	,
        Source.virusCheckStatus	,
        Source.redactedStatus	,
        Source.filename	,
        Source.versionfilename	,
        Source.documentType	,
        Source.description	,
        Source.size	,
        Source.incomingoutgoingexternal	,
        Source.dateCreated	,
        Source.lastModified	,
        Source.datePublished	,
        Source.publishedstatus	,
        Source.sourceSystem	,
        Source.horizonFolderId	,
        Source.originalFilename	,
        Source.mime	,
        Source.documentURI	,
        Source.publishedDocumentURI	,
        Source.fileMD5	,
        Source.dateReceived	,
        Source.origin	,
        Source.owner	,
        Source.author	,
        Source.caseStage	,
        Source.Migrated,
        Source.ODTSourceSystem,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.appeals_document_metadata is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new horizon_appeals_document_metadata

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.appeals_document_metadata

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY documentId NULLS LAST) AS AppealsDocumentMetadataID	,
        documentId	,
        caseId	,
        caseReference	,
        casenumber	,
        caseType	,
        caseworktypegroup	,
        caseworktypeabbreviation	,
        version	,
        virusCheckStatus	,
        redactedStatus	,
        filename	,
        versionfilename	,
        documentType	,
        description	,
        size	,
        incomingoutgoingexternal	,
        dateCreated	,
        lastModified	,
        datePublished	,
        publishedstatus	,
        sourceSystem	,
        horizonFolderId	,
        originalFilename	,
        mime	,
        documentURI	,
        publishedDocumentURI	,
        fileMD5	,
        dateReceived	,
        origin	,
        owner	,
        author	,
        caseStage	,
        Migrated,
        ODTSourceSystem,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.appeals_document_metadata;
